website_summaries.verdict: Graphite shafts are lightweight and deliver a good level of quality in a starter set.
pros: Sharp-looking clubs and bag that you'll love to carry on the course
Includes a driver, a fairway wood, a hybrid wood, five irons, a putter, and a bag
Clubs deliver a large sweet spot that's great for novice players just learning to swing
cons: Club shafts have some give to them
Bag is not of the highest quality

customer_reviews.title: Driver hits and feels good. She got her slice corrected and is driving ...
customer_reviews.text: We are new to the game and my wife likes pink, I found these and she loves them. She has a little trouble with the hybrid club but so does everyone one at first they say. Driver hits and feels good. She got her slice corrected and is driving a lot further than the couple we play with. Great clubs, look and feel good and perform just as well.Glad to have purchased this set. My wife is about 5'6 and they fit her very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised by the Golf Bag and Clubs! The Golf Clubs are a nice weight and made well, as well as Easy to grip handles. The Golf Bag is beautiful. Well made and many zippered compartments! Buy this set! For the money... it's really an Excellent Value!
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: This did not look like a new set of clubs
customer_reviews.text: These arrived on time but the are dirty all over areas of the golf club bag. There are several areas of dirt or brown substance spots.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyvoelm

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the clubs a couple of months and they are already losing chunks from the woods. The top of the driver is completely chipped. Seems like they are poorly made. I am really let down because I really love these clubs
customer_reviews.author: Denise R. Macrina

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs for amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for beginners but make you look professional! I don’t really have a complaint. I do wish the covers were zipper vs pull on but that’s just a preference not a complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie

customer_reviews.title: economic and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love that the overall design of these clubs is girly but not girly. I wanted a set to learn better how to play and these clubs totally do that. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good set for a beginner.
customer_reviews.text: I love the whole golf set! Not very heavy, so I can easily carry it on our par 3 executive course. Nice double shoulder harness. Plenty of storage. The driver is oversized so it's a bit hard to control. Gets better with practice. But, for a beginner it's a very good set. The quality is good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jan B.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice clubs at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Clubs were received on time and used the next day. Very nice clubs at a reasonable price. Packaged well with no damage. Will be using them as a second set at my daughter's - was pleased with how they performed.
customer_reviews.author: KBKCI

customer_reviews.title: Titanium Driver is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new clubs! They arrived quickly and were packaged with bubble wrap. The bag is great but I wish it had a small zipper pouch above the ball bag, had to put tees in one of the smaller side pouches. This is perfect for a beginner or for someone like me who hasn't played golf in years.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H

customer_reviews.title: Very nice clubs
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my girlfriend to get into golfing. The clubs are a little tall for her so we will have to go and get them altered. She is 5' 2" and the driver is tall enough for me (6' 1") to use comfortably. Very nice set of clubs for the price and very good beginner set for her.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Solum

customer_reviews.title: Must have for beginner
customer_reviews.text: WOW !! Super excited -- I am such a girlie girl so first thought was "it is so cute". I am a beginner so this set is perfect -
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Queen

customer_reviews.title: When I got the package it was a little beat up but the clubs were in great shape. She took them to NC and we ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my girlfriend who wants to start golfing with me. When I got the package it was a little beat up but the clubs were in great shape. She took them to NC and we played a few rounds, for a beginner set this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Millard Townsend

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. Honest clubs.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect starting ladies clubs. Kinda long but they work. If you're shorter than 5'6 I wouldn't buy them. Good price and good clubs.
customer_reviews.author: mason parker

customer_reviews.title: Great complete women's set
customer_reviews.text: Great clubs. My wife loves them and is enjoying them as she learns to play. Very easy to hit and a great looking set too!
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & very good price!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of clubs for a beginner golfer!! Great quality and they shipped really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom for mothers day. She absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bell

customer_reviews.title: really nice set for a novice player
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them, really nice set for a novice player.
customer_reviews.author: r.r.

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for someone just getting into golf
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this set. They are perfect for someone just getting into golf.
customer_reviews.author: Donald McF

customer_reviews.title: I love these golf clubs
customer_reviews.text: I love these golf clubs! I just started golfing a few years ago and always returned but these are a great starter set. They give a nice variety of clubs and woods and the bag is cute. I would highly recommend this product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Conti

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the look, feel and playability of these clubs. What an improvement!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hensel

customer_reviews.title: She loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought these has a gift for one of my staff members at work. She loved it
customer_reviews.author: Olumide

customer_reviews.title: Order these!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The clubs are PERFECT! I'm a beginner and these are beautiful clubs. Also, received 3 days after ordering! Super fast shipping. So happy with my purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Shantel :)

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES them! They are perfect! Right height and weight, They bag is good looking and right for any age.
customer_reviews.author: jill zumack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set of clubs and the bag is super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Great Product for the Price, bought for my ten year old as her first set of ladies clubs and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: kwalkerpro

customer_reviews.title: Nice clubs X-L extra light
customer_reviews.text: Great clubs for novice player. Clubs are X-L extra light which is what I have been told by Pro Shop I need to look for in a club. Had one club that did not have the 'pink x triangular' symbol on bottom & after contacting seller was sent a new club. Very pleased. Highly recommend. Thanks again for sending new club.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of these. Beautiful set.
customer_reviews.author: lynmal

customer_reviews.title: Bag is garbage
customer_reviews.text: The Clubs Are ok, but the bag is a POS...would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Murray

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are lightweight, and look fantastic. I can't wait to use them when the weather gets warmer!
customer_reviews.author: Marty Diller

product_meta.title: Aspire X1 Ladies Womens Complete Right Handed Golf Clubs Set Includes Titanium Driver, S.S. Fairway, S.S. Hybrid, S.S. 6-PW Irons, Putter, Stand Bag, 3 H/C's Cherry Pink
product_meta.description: This Aspire X1 complete golf set is designed for the player looking for style and performance. From the woods to the hybrids all the way through the wedge, each club was designed to fit together and offer forgiveness, confidence and style. This complete set takes the guesswork out of purchasing because everything you need is in the bag.
feature_bullets: Includes Titanium Driver, Fairway Wood, Hybrid, 6-PW Irons, Putter, Stand Bag, 3 H/C's
460cc Titanium Driver! Stainless Steel Woods and Irons
Ultra Light High Modulus 100% Graphite Shaft for all woods!
Matching Deluxe Dual-Strap Golf Bag and Headcovers! Carry your bag like a backpack!
This golf set is for a right handed player!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars64 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
